title: Bug 116744 - Dynamic text content type has no effect
OB: The dynamic text element is not displaying the content of the specified field correctly.
EB: The dynamic text element should display the content of the specified field correctly based on its content type.
SR: To reproduce the issue:1. Create a database field with three types of content:   a) HTML text within <html>...</html> tag.   b) HTML fragments not within <html> tag.   c) Text with RTF tags.2. Use a dynamic text element to display the contents of this field.3. Observe that the content is not displayed correctly according to its content type.
